about_the_game:
Game Features

A card-centric delivery journey

  • Reach your destination through a deck of trucks and characters

  • You will encounter different event cards and enemy cards on the way, and you need to respond flexibly!

  • The environment will also bring risks, you can solve them through cards, and at the same time, you may also gain benefits!

Temperature, environment, and materials constitute the elements of survival

  • On the snow, you will continue to suffer from increasingly severe cold, you need enough fuel!

  • Your team will endure hunger and pressure, and you can go further only if you can solve them

  • Ammunition, tools... cards will also consume some supplies. Goods are not just trading items, manage your resources well

Trade, skills and equipment between different shelters

  • Each shelter has different goods to buy and sell

  • You can learn different skills in different shelters

  • You can also buy different equipment and vehicle accessories in different shelters!

Multiple recruitable characters, as well as development and construction combined with cards

  • You can recruit several different characters to freely match your team!

  • You can plan different ability directions for them, and each character can freely learn any skills to form your deck!

  • They have different spark abilities, and each character is unique!

Truck modification and construction

  • You can upgrade and modify your truck to help you cross the snow better.

  • The truck has its own unique cards, and you can also get some more special and unique cards through accessories!

Snow World

This world was once beautiful and civilized, but all of this is gone...

The endless snow has destroyed almost everything, except for dozens of different shelters on the snow and the refugees who have never stopped in the snow.

By chance, you become a "messenger" across the snow. Your job is to cross the snow to bring products, technology and information to the shelters. Perhaps, you can also bring a glimmer of hope to the refugees.

This is not an easy job, but there is no doubt that it is an important job in this era.

What kind of story will you and this snowy land usher in?

Maybe everything depends on your hands.

Let's go, Mr. "Messenger".

Main story and character stories

  • Depending on your choices and actions, the snowy land may have a different ending!

  • Each recruitable character will have his or her own character story. You can learn about the past of your teammates and take a glimpse of the snowy land.

Rich quest lines and random events

  • Thirteen large shelters and more than twenty small shelters, a rich world view and plot will unfold before your eyes

  • Whether in the shelter or on the snow, you have the opportunity to start a different story

short_description: In "雪原余烬 Snow Ash", you will been a "messenger", crosses snow and delivers goods between different shelters. On the way, you will encounter low temperatures, snow and enemies, but you will also encounter different events, go to different places, and bring warmth and hope to the people on the snow.
